In the North Veratis watched the glow become larger until it appeared as th=
e light of a summer day. he sensed a disturbance in the planet. "No" he tho=
ught "It is not the time yet." his thoughts were coming to quickly and the =
old scientist began to speak "All is not one . The imposter must be elimina=
ted."

Foxfingers reached solid ground as the light overcame him. Startled =
the bot lost control and crashed along the ground. "Are we all dead?" he ca=
lled out over the commlink.

Looking out a viewport in the Iron fist Lady H=
awk sees the brilliance and feals a sudden calm. "Was that an explosion?"Sh=
e wonders outloud to herself as she stays entranced. "Did my father succeed=
?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2001 7:11 PM
  Subject: Arise.....(Al=
l NEED to read this, it affects everybody)


  ::Dark Prime-->Optimus Prime=
::
   
      He had been wandering for days, not caring if he returned to N=
od. Suddenly he got a feeling that something wasn't right in the Universe. =
There were too many evils, and and age old riverly could not be brought to =
a close.
      Galvatron was alive. Optimus Prime was stuck within the Evil=
ness of Dark Prime. They would not be able to fight both being evil. Primus=
 needed to be sated.
      The Time Gateway (remember that?) Glowed with a =
firey reddness. The source of Prime's evil and his lust for the power of Cr=
onus was seated there. The Gateway exploded, shattering into thousands of p=
eices.
      Dark Prime fell to his knees. His body was wracked with pain. =
His chest panel opened of it's own will (well, not really) and the Autobot =
Matrix emerged. It floated out from Prime's chest and then it opened. Relea=
sing all of Prime's goodness back into him, but leaving just enough evil to=
 get the job done. Prime's body went through a change as well, from his kne=
es to his feet became Blue, his upper legs became white, his arms and chest=
 became the familiar Prime Red. His mouth plate became silver, along with m=
uch of his face, the helmet that surrounded it bacame blue, his hands also =
became Blue.
      As the Matrix went back into his chest a giant light emi=
tted from him, it covered the entire planet (got permission) everything on =
the planet saw this light.
      A voice boomed over the planet, all bots c=
ould hear this as well, no matter where they were. The voice said, "Arise, =
Optimus Prime."
      Dark Prime had died, Optimus Prime was reborn, with a=
 new drive.
   
  (Please add Dark Prime to the Matrix)

        Yahoo! Gro=
ups Sponsor
